name: Proprietorship
description: Single-owner business without separate legal entity.

name: Partnership Firm
description: Business owned by two or more partners registered under the Partnership Act, 1932.

name: LLP (Limited Liability Partnership)
description: Hybrid structure with limited liability and partnership flexibility.

name: Private Limited Company
description: Separate legal entity registered under Companies Act, owned by shareholders.

name: Public Limited Company
description: Company that can raise capital from the public; strictly regulated.

name: One Person Company (OPC)
description: Single-member company structure with limited liability benefits.

name: NGO / Section 8 Company
description: Non-profit company formed for social or charitable purposes.

name: HUF (Hindu Undivided Family)
description: Family-based business entity recognized under Hindu law.

name: Trust
description: Entity managed by trustees for public or private benefit.

name: Society
description: Association of individuals, usually for charitable or cultural activities.
